title: Strategic Marketing
text: Below are selected projects that showcase my work in strategic marketing, campaign development, and brand management. These examples highlight how I apply leadership, informed decision making, and creative direction to drive marketing success.

title: Strategic Marketing
section: CPP Undeclared Advising Socials: Campaign Planning
text:
CPP Undeclared Advising Socials: Campaign Planning
In this project, I took over development for comprehensive and impact marketing campaign to our target market - Undeclared Students at Cal Poly Pomona.Though a comprehensive promotional strategy campaign highlighting information resources to different colleges across Cal Poly Pomona and advising services. From audience segmentation to messaging strategy, I continue to manage the campaign, aligning it with advising objectives and measurable attendance KPIs.
Skills Demonstrated:

Marketing Strategy: Defined objectives and tactics for maximum impact.
Team Coordination: Oversaw collaboration across creative, data, and channel teams.
Performance Tracking: Implemented real-time metrics and post-campaign analysis.
Brand Positioning: Ensured consistency across all touchpoints.

title: Strategic Marketing
section: Delta Sigma Pi Eta Chi Chapter: Brand Audit & Positioning
text:
Delta Sigma Pi Eta Chi Chapter: Brand Audit & Positioning
This initiative involved conducting a full brand audit for Delta Sigma Pi, Eta Chi Chapter, evaluating its current market perception, competitive landscape, and customer engagement. I synthesized insights into a refreshed brand strategy and visual identity though there Social Media Marketing.
Skills Demonstrated:

Brand Analysis: Audited messaging, tone, and visual identity.
Competitive Benchmarking: Evaluated brand positioning within the market.
Strategic Communication: Developed new value propositions and storytelling elements.
Stakeholder Presentation: Delivered recommendations to senior leadership.

title: Strategic Marketing
section: OC Comedy’s Comedy On Tap at Noble Ale Brewery: Client Consulting & Campaign Optimization
text:
OC Comedy’s Comedy On Tap at Noble Ale Brewery: Client Consulting & Campaign Optimization
I collaborated with a client to assess and optimize their existing marketing efforts. Through audits, persona development, and campaign refinement,in hopes of improving ROI and audience engagement.I was apart of a class that was tasked in creating a new campaign to optimization for the business with client input.
Skills Demonstrated:

Client Consulting: Provided clear insights and strategic guidance.
Persona Development: Built target personas to guide messaging.
Campaign Optimization: Identified and addressed areas of underperformance.
Data-Driven Adjustments: Leveraged analytics to refine tactics.
Buzz-Marketing Tastics: Create a plan to create loyal buzz for clients.

title: Professional Summary
Social Media Engagement Analysis
text:
Overview
This analysis examined engagement metrics across multiple social media platforms to identify content trends, audience preferences, and posting strategies that drive performance.




Learning Outcomes

Aggregate and clean social media data.

Identify high-performing content formats.

Understand audience behavior and peak times.

Support social strategy with data-backed recommendations.

Visualize results in an executive summary.




Key Skills Gained

Social analytics

Platform metric APIs

Content performance tracking

Audience insights

Strategic planning

title: Hi, I’m Carolina Rivera
text: I’m an aspiring marketing logistics professional. I specialize in transforming complex designs and information into clear, engaging, and actionable market positioning for brands and companies.

title: Campaign Insights Dashboard
text:
Overview
This project involves building involved building a MYbar RSVP system and visualize marketing campaign performance though Instamatics. Metrics were used to track attendance rate, conversion rate, and ROI were tracked across channels using RSVPS, and total attendance.




Learning Outcomes

Visualize and monitor key marketing metrics.

Analyze performance trends across multiple campaigns.

Identify high- and low-performing segments.

Communicate insights through interactive visuals.

Develop data-informed recommendations.




Key Skills Gained

Dashboard development

Campaign analytics

Data wrangling in R

Tableau or R Shiny visualization

Performance measurement

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
Below are selected projects that highlight my experience applying marketing to real-world challenges. These projects reflect my ability to combine statistical tools, building campaigns, and strategic thinking to inform decisions and drive results.
Whether it was analyzing campaign performance, creating a promotional plan to then structure media releases, each project is rooted in understanding business structure and strategies. Then creating email formats and organizing the delivery of products to which allowed for supply chain management with logistical thinking and email marketing.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
What You’ll Find

Campaign Performance Evaluation: Assessing the success of digital marketing initiatives through data-driven content planning.
Marketing Strategy & Attribution: Understanding how various channels and tactics contribute to overall success.
Customer & Market Insights: Leveraging analytics to understand consumer behavior and optimize marketing strategies for better experiences.

title: Résumé
text:
You can view a PDF version of my résumé here.

Professional Summary
Results-driven marketing professional with a strong foundation in social media strategy, content creation, and digital marketing analytics. Experienced in managing brand identity and online presence across platforms for diverse industries, including retail, hospitality, and personal care. Proven ability to increase engagement, optimize performance through data analysis, and collaborate cross-functionally to drive campaign success. Adept at using tools such as Google Analytics, Canva, and Meta Business Suite, with a background in project coordination, client relations, and soft bilingual communication skills (English/Spanish). Passionate about creating impactful brand stories and delivering measurable marketing outcomes.


Technical Skills

Software: Microsoft 365, Adobe, Asana, Canva, Google Suite, R and Quarto
Soft Skills: Consumer Service, Skilled Multitasking, Organization, Commitment to Work, and Trainable
